app.title: Faceit AI Bot - Statistics Analysis and Teammate Finder
app.description: Tool for analyzing game statistics and finding teammates on Faceit platform. Download browser extension or full version on our website.

player.title: CS2 Player Analysis
player.subtitle: Get detailed statistics analysis and personalized recommendations

landing.title: AI demo coach and teammate finder for Faceit
landing.subtitle: Upload CS2 demos, get AI coaching reports and find teammates that match your level and playstyle.
landing.feature_demo_desc: AI reviews your demo, finds mistakes and returns a clear coaching report with recommendations.
landing.feature_stats_desc: Connect your account and see what your long-term stats say about your play.
landing.feature_team_desc: Find teammates by ELO, roles, language and playstyle using Faceit data and AI.
landing.social_subtitle: Faceit AI Bot combines deep analytics and teammate search so you rage less and win more.
landing.social_benefit_1: Fewer random teammates, more coordinated games.
landing.social_benefit_2: Match with players by roles and level, not just rating.
landing.social_benefit_3: AI reports that clearly explain what to improve.
landing.social_metric_1_desc: Structured training advice instead of vague tips.
landing.social_metric_2_desc: Find people whose playstyle actually fits yours.
landing.social_metric_3_desc: The service highlights key mistakes and strengths from your demos and stats.

teammate.title: Teammate search powered by Faceit data
teammate.placeholder: AI will suggest teammates by your level, roles and playstyle.
teammate.no_results: Try changing level range or role, or play a few more matches ‚Äî we are expanding the player pool and improving matching.
teammate.no_results_hint: Right now search is in beta and uses basic Faceit stats plus AI compatibility scoring.
